subject: FW: Re: Expectations
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I am trying not to get a big head.  This was from the video tape interview 
done Sunday.


>From: ---------------
>To: Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...>
>Subject: Re: Expectations
>Date: Tue, 3 Apr 2007 23:28:50 -0700 (PDT)
>
>Hi Frank,
>
>   The interview did go well. Sorry for any anxiety it may have caused but 
>hopefully you are now comfortable with me. I am committed to honoring your 
>intended purpose and today shared time with Mark Macy using your box and he 
>is equally impressed. Mark only adheres to the research of contact with 
>postive ethereal beings. You are considered by many to be an important 
>pioneer in the field of ITC research.
>
>   Thank you for your time and trust. You have managed to break new ground 
>and have joined the ranks of those that have made a real impact in 
>facilitating communication with non physical intelligence.
>
>   Sincerely, Bill -----
